body: . Your kingdom's alignment helps determine how loyal, prosperous, and stable your kingdom is. Your kingdom may be a lawful good bastion against a nearby land of devil worshipers, or a chaotic neutral territory of cutthroat traders whose government does very little to interfere with the rights of its citizens.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Building/Founding a Kingdom/Choose Your Kingdoms Alignment
name: Choose Your Kingdom's Alignment
